ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, the Observer staff is ANOTHER lens quest, not the spare lens one. But the DE in Freeport, I ve never found. I hear that people have found her,
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
> Rick,
>
> I follow the note to Grub n Grob but get stuck there.
> Two of the lens people say "come back next week", the
> third I tried leads me to Freeport. At the store I
> ask eveyrone about the dark elf rogue but no one
> replies, and I can't find an underground enterance. I
> have heard of the name the woman is supposed to be,
> HOWEVER, she cons red to me and when I approach her
> about the lens she does nothing. I believe it to be
> an unfinished quest. I heard it was supposed to be
> part or near the Staff of the Observer (best staff in
> game for casters) quest...
>
> I'll try the thermal cloak tonight as well, using
> leather, cloth, and various other equipment. I think
> I decyphered it well enough to get it.
>

Actually, the Observer staff is ANOTHER lens quest, not
the spare lens one. But the DE in Freeport, I've never found.
I hear that people have found her, killed her and gotten the
lens. I'm sure I can kill her, but I can't find her.

The two that say come back? No clue, maybe it has to be done after
the two Spare lens that are suppose to be there are found.
One is the freeport elf, which has been found and the other
is on a Gnome, same last name as the Gnomes that you have
to ask about the lens, but is found (rarely) in the Mino caves, way back
in there. Which would be dangerous for me, but near suicide for someone
level 11 or lower.

-Zikkin
